Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Biden administration has not lowered the US age of consent to eight.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the actions of the Biden administration, suggesting that they have made a significant change to the age of consent.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting a doctored image of a CNN article to support its false claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible sources to back up the assertion that the age of consent has been lowered.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the President has the authority to unilaterally change the age of consent laws.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the claim is part of a misinformation campaign, potentially linked to QAnon conspiracy theory groups.
